name: Venomfang
speed: walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.

trait.name: Amphibious
text: Venomfang can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
text: Venomfang makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
text: Venomfang exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Source: Lost Mine of Phandelver p. 63
